about

My name is Sam and I love crisps. On this website I review the crisps I have eaten. All the crisps I review on this blog are vegan. I hope you enjoy reading what I have written.


  • Seabrook - Sea Salted

    Seabrook - Sea Salted Lets ease back into this with something simple. A real classic of the genre. Seabrook are the master of ridged crisps. They’ve cracked the formula. Wavy and crisp with just the right amount of bite. If you’re looking for a lunch box crisp, you could do...
